author: Staff Reporter
text:
Around 100 women staged a sit-in protest inside a private institute that offers six-month courses in tailoring and jewellery making at Avinashi on Wednesday, alleging that the lessons were not taught fully as promised during the enrolment.

Fee

According to them, the institute charged Rs. 3,500 in advance for lessons in tailoring, embroidery, fashion designing and jewellery making.

“We have spent nearly Rs. 10,000 for buying accessories for learning embroidery and tailoring techniques and transportation. But tutoring was not up to the mark and we want the course fee back”, they demanded.

As tension mounted, revenue officials intervened and the institute offered to conduct the lessons once again.
title: Women stage protest
